article.title: Raytheon to Design and Develop Israeli Missile Defense System
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: Raytheon Company has been awarded a contract worth more than $100 million by Rafael Advanced Defense Systems Ltd. to design and develop the David's Sling Weapon System (DSWS). DSWS will intercept short-range ballistic missiles, large caliber rockets and cruise missiles in their terminal flight phase.
